0.1.name: wordpress/dashboard-heaven
0.1.description:
Dashboard Heaven lets you get rid of those annoying feeds and widgets on your user's dashboard.

Dashboard Heaven offers * Widget to User-level/role customisation * Control which user levels see which widget. * Hide all or only a few dashboard widgets

Here's what people have been saying about Dashboard Heaven...

'Brilliant plugin  just what I need for my cms sites' 'After trying a couple of dashboard plugins yours is the first one that actually works' 'Thank you for this excellent plugin'
